languages.text:
Вы получили новое оборудование для корабля.
Откройте меню управления кораблем на панели справа. Для установки оборудования дважды кликните [ЛКМ] по его иконке или перетащите ее в нужный отсек, зажав [ЛКМ].

You have received new equipment for your ship!
To install it, open the voidship management screen from the panel on the right. Double click [LMB] on the equipment's icon or hold [LMB] and drag it to the desired section.
languages.original_text:
Вы получили новое оборудование для корабля.
Откройте меню управления кораблем на панели справа. Для установки оборудования дважды кликните [ЛКМ] по его иконке или перетащите ее в нужный отсек, зажав [ЛКМ].

traits.locale_text:
You have received new equipment for your ship!
To instal it, open the voidship management screen from the panel on the right. Double click [LMB] on the equipment's icon or hold [LMB] and drag it to the desired compartment.

You have received new equipment for your ship!
To instal it, open the voidship management screen from the panel on the right. Double click [LMB] on the equipment's icon or hold [LMB] and drag it to the desired compartment.

To instal it, open the voidship management screen from the panel on the right. Double click [LMB] on the equipment's icon or hold [LMB] and drag it to the desired section.

To install it, open the voidship management screen from the panel on the right. Double click [LMB] on the equipment's icon or hold [LMB] and drag it to the desired section.

You have received new equipment for your ship!
To install it, open the voidship management screen from the panel on the right. Double click [LMB] on the equipment's icon or hold [LMB] and drag it to the desired section.

languages.text:
您的舰船获得了新的装备！
若要安装新的装备，请通过右侧面板打开虚空舰管理界面。您可以在装备上双击鼠标左键，或按住鼠标左键，将装备拖拽至所需栏位。
languages.original_text:
You have received new equipment for your ship!
To install it, open the voidship management screen from the panel on the right. Double click [LMB] on the equipment's icon or hold [LMB] and drag it to the desired section.

traits.locale_text:
您的舰船获得了新的装备！
若要安装新的装备，请通过右侧面板打开虚空舰管理界面。您可以在装备上双击鼠标左键，或按住鼠标左键，将装备拖拽至所需栏位。

languages.text:
船に新しい装備が追加された！
右側のパネルからヴォイドシップ管理画面を開いて、装備を取り付けよう。装備アイコンの上で [LMB] をダブルクリックするか、[LMB] を押した状態で希望するセクションまでドラッグする。
languages.original_text:
You have received new equipment for your ship!
To install it, open the voidship management screen from the panel on the right. Double click [LMB] on the equipment's icon or hold [LMB] and drag it to the desired section.

traits.locale_text:
船に新しい装備が追加された！
右側のパネルからヴォイドシップ管理画面を開いて、装備を取り付けよう。装備アイコンの上で [LMB] をダブルクリックするか、[LMB] を押した状態で希望するセクションまでドラッグする。

languages.text:
¡Has recibido equipo nuevo para la nave!
Para instalarlo, abre la pantalla de gestión de la nave del vacío desde el panel de la derecha. Haz doble clic con el [botón izquierdo del ratón] en el icono del equipo o mantén el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre él y arrástralo hasta la sección que quieras
languages.original_text:
You have received new equipment for your ship!
To install it, open the voidship management screen from the panel on the right. Double click [LMB] on the equipment's icon or hold [LMB] and drag it to the desired section.

traits.locale_text:
¡Has recibido equipo nuevo para la nave!
Para instalarlo, abre la pantalla de gestión de la nave del vacío desde el panel de la derecha. Haz doble clic con el [botón izquierdo del ratón] en el icono del equipo o mantén el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre él y arrástralo hasta la sección que quieras

languages.text:
Du hast neue Ausrüstung für dein Schiff erhalten!
Um sie zu installieren, öffnest du den Raumschiffverwaltungsbildschirm im Feld auf der rechten Seite. Doppelklicke mit [LMB] auf das Symbol der Ausrüstung oder halte die [LMB] gedrückt und ziehe sie in den gewünschten Bereich.
languages.original_text:
You have received new equipment for your ship!
To install it, open the voidship management screen from the panel on the right. Double click [LMB] on the equipment's icon or hold [LMB] and drag it to the desired section.

traits.locale_text:
Du hast neue Ausrüstung für dein Schiff erhalten!
Um sie zu installieren, öffnest du den Raumschiffverwaltungsbildschirm im Feld auf der rechten Seite. Doppelklicke mit der [LMB] auf das Symbol der Ausrüstung oder halte die [LMB] gedrückt und ziehe sie in den gewünschten Bereich.

languages.text:
Vous avez reçu un nouvel équipement pour votre vaisseau !
Pour l'installer, ouvrez l'écran de gestion du vaisseau spatial depuis le panneau de droite. Double-cliquez avec le [BGS] sur l'icône d'équipement ou maintenez le [BGS] enfoncé et faites-le glisser jusqu'à la section souhaitée.
languages.original_text:
You have received new equipment for your ship!
To install it, open the voidship management screen from the panel on the right. Double click [LMB] on the equipment's icon or hold [LMB] and drag it to the desired section.

traits.locale_text:
Vous avez reçu un nouvel équipement pour votre vaisseau !
Pour l'installer, ouvrez l'écran de gestion du vaisseau spatial depuis le panneau de droite. Double-cliquez avec le [BGS] sur l'icône d'équipement ou maintenez le [BGS] enfoncé et faites-le glisser jusqu'à la section souhaitée.

languages.text:
Gemin için yeni ekipman edindin!
Kurmak için sağdaki panelden uçsuz gemisi yönetimi ekranını aç. Ekipmanın simgesinin üzerine gelip sol fare tuşuyla çift tıkla veya sol fare tuşunu basılı tutup istediğin bölüme sürükle.
languages.original_text:
You have received new equipment for your ship!
To install it, open the voidship management screen from the panel on the right. Double click [LMB] on the equipment's icon or hold [LMB] and drag it to the desired section.
